languages.text: Судьба Зловещего воя ныне известна, и нить вюрда отважной стаи перерезана. Последнему выжившему их брату, Ульфару Громогласному, предстоит проложить себе новый путь служения Всеотцу во вселенной.

The fate of the Baleful Howl is now known, and the threads of the valiant pack's wyrd have been severed. Their last surviving brother, Ulfar Thunderlung, must now forge a new path of service to the Allfather for himself in this universe.
languages.original_text: Судьба Зловещего воя ныне известна, и нить вюрда отважной стаи перерезана. Последнему выжившему их брату, Ульфару Громогласному, предстоит проложить себе новый путь служения Всеотцу во вселенной.

traits.locale_text: The fate of the Famehungry is now known, and the threads of the valiant pack's wyrd have severed. Their last surviving brother, Ulfar Thunderlung, must now forge a new path of service to the Allfather for himself in this universe.

The fate of the Famehungry is now known, and the threads of the valiant pack's wyrd have severed. Their last surviving brother, Ulfar Thunderlung, must now forge a new path of service to the Allfather for himself in this universe.

The fate of the Baleful Howl is now known, and the threads of the valiant pack's wyrd have been severed. Their last surviving brother, Ulfar Thunderlung, must now forge a new path of service to the Allfather for himself in this universe.

The fate of the Baleful Howl is now known, and the threads of the valiant pack's wyrd have been severed. Their last surviving brother, Ulfar Thunderlung, must now forge a new path of service to the Allfather for himself in this universe.

languages.text: Le sort des Hurleurs sanguinaires est désormais connu et les fils du wyrd de la vaillante meute ont été tranchés. Leur dernier frère survivant, Ulfar Voix-du-Tonnerre, doit maintenant se tracer une nouvelle voie au service du Père de Tous dans cet univers.
languages.original_text: The fate of the Baleful Howl is now known, and the threads of the valiant pack's wyrd have been severed. Their last surviving brother, Ulfar Thunderlung, must now forge a new path of service to the Allfather for himself in this universe.

traits.locale_text: Le sort des Hurleurs sanguinaires est désormais connu et les fils du wyrd de la vaillante meute ont été tranchés. Leur dernier frère survivant, Ulfar Voix-du-Tonnerre, doit maintenant se tracer une nouvelle voie au service du Père de Tous dans cet univers.

languages.text: 行商浪人已经得知了怒嚎者狼群的命运，他们命运的丝线已经被切断了。如今，狼群最后的幸存者，乌尔法·雷狼，只能靠自己的力量，在这个宇宙中开辟出新的道路，侍奉全父。
languages.original_text: The fate of the Baleful Howl is now known, and the threads of the valiant pack's wyrd have been severed. Their last surviving brother, Ulfar Thunderlung, must now forge a new path of service to the Allfather for himself in this universe.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人已经得知了渴名者狼群的命运，他们命运的丝线已经被切断了。如今，狼群最后的幸存者，乌尔法·雷狼，只能靠自己的力量，在这个宇宙中开辟出新的道路，侍奉全父。

languages.text: 破滅の咆哮の運命は広く知られるところとなり、勇敢な群れの運命の糸は断ち切られた。最後に生き残った兄弟、ウルファー・サンダーラングは、この宇宙で全知の父に仕えるための新たな道を切り拓かなければならない。
languages.original_text: The fate of the Baleful Howl is now known, and the threads of the valiant pack's wyrd have been severed. Their last surviving brother, Ulfar Thunderlung, must now forge a new path of service to the Allfather for himself in this universe.

traits.locale_text: 破滅の咆哮の運命は広く知られるところとなり、勇敢な群れの運命の糸は断ち切られた。最後に生き残った兄弟、ウルファー・サンダーラングは、この宇宙で全知の父に仕えるための新たな道を切り拓かなければならない。

languages.text: Das Schicksal der Baleful Howl ist nun bekannt, und die Wyrd-Fäden des tapferen Rudels wurden gekappt. Der letzte überlebende Bruder, Ulfar Donnerlunge, muss nun in diesem Universum allein einen neuen Pfad des Dienstes am Allvater beschreiten.
languages.original_text: The fate of the Baleful Howl is now known, and the threads of the valiant pack's wyrd have been severed. Their last surviving brother, Ulfar Thunderlung, must now forge a new path of service to the Allfather for himself in this universe.

traits.locale_text: Das Schicksal der Baleful Howl ist nun bekannt, und die Wyrd-Fäden des tapferen Rudels wurden gekappt. Der letzte überlebende Bruder, Ulfar Donnerlunge, muss nun in diesem Universum allein einen neuen Pfad des Dienstes am Allvater beschreiten.

languages.text: El destino del Aullido Torvo ha salido a la luz y el destino de la valiente jauría ha sido cortado. El único superviviente, Ulfar Pulmón Atronador, ahora debe forjarse un nuevo camino de servicio al Padre de todas las cosas en este universo.
languages.original_text: The fate of the Baleful Howl is now known, and the threads of the valiant pack's wyrd have been severed. Their last surviving brother, Ulfar Thunderlung, must now forge a new path of service to the Allfather for himself in this universe.

traits.locale_text: El destino del Aullido Torvo ha salido a la luz y el destino de la valiente jauría ha sido cortado. El único superviviente, Ulfar Pulmón Atronador, ahora debe forjarse un nuevo camino de servicio al Padre de todas las cosas en este universo.

languages.text: Uğursuz Uluma'nın başına gelenler ortaya çıktı ve yiğit sürünün kader ağları koptu. Hayatta kalan son kardeş Ulfar Tufanciğer, şimdi bu evrende Yücebaba'ya hizmet etmenin yeni bir yolunu bulmalı.
languages.original_text: The fate of the Baleful Howl is now known, and the threads of the valiant pack's wyrd have been severed. Their last surviving brother, Ulfar Thunderlung, must now forge a new path of service to the Allfather for himself in this universe.
